LanguageData.AEXP_Coyote.label: coyote
LanguageData.AEXP_Coyote.description: A praire wolf native to desert and shrubland areas. It's capable of hunting much bigger prey, and is often found in packs, similar to a wolf.
LanguageData.AEXP_Coyote.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.AEXP_Coyote.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.AEXP_Coyote.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.AEXP_Giraffe.label: giraffe
LanguageData.AEXP_Giraffe.description: A giraffe is one of the tallest mammals in the galaxy, using it's long neck to reach leaves and branches unavailable for smaller herbivores.
LanguageData.AEXP_Giraffe.tools.0.label: left hoof
LanguageData.AEXP_Giraffe.tools.1.label: right hoof
LanguageData.AEXP_Giraffe.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.AEXP_Hippopotamus.label: hippopotamus
LanguageData.AEXP_Hippopotamus.description: A massive semi-aquatic hoofed mammal with thick skin and a very powerful jaw.\n\nExtremely difficult to tame, these monstrous beings often attack on a failed attempt.
LanguageData.AEXP_Hippopotamus.tools.1.label: left foot
LanguageData.AEXP_Hippopotamus.tools.2.label: right foot
LanguageData.AEXP_Hippopotamus.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.AEXP_Zebra.label: zebra
LanguageData.AEXP_Zebra.description: A member of the horse family native to arid and desert areas. Whilst it doesn't share the same bodysize as a horse, due to years of evolution it's one of the fastest hooved animals.
LanguageData.AEXP_Zebra.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.AEXP_Zebra.tools.1.label: left hoof
LanguageData.AEXP_Zebra.tools.2.label: right hoof
LanguageData.AEXP_Wildebeest.label: wildebeest
LanguageData.AEXP_Wildebeest.description: Also called Gnu, this wild cow earned it's name with it's menacing horns, pointed beard and large head. These animals are known from their migrations and the size of their herds.\n\nDue to its wildness, it produces milk at much slower rate than a standard cow.
LanguageData.AEXP_Wildebeest.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.AEXP_Wildebeest.tools.2.label: left hoof
LanguageData.AEXP_Wildebeest.tools.3.label: right hoof
LanguageData.AEXP_Crocodile.label: crocodile
LanguageData.AEXP_Crocodile.description: A large semi-aquatic reptile, most often found on the river banks. It's predatory insticts combined with an extremely strong jaw allow them to tackle much larger prey. Older crocodiles can grow to monstrous sizes.
LanguageData.AEXP_Cheetah.label: cheetah
LanguageData.AEXP_Cheetah.description: These cats are lean and lanky, allowing them to reach incredible speeds. They have tan-colored fur with solid black, round spots, very long legs, a long narrow tail for balance, and a deep chest that contains large lungs.
